original_text: In the very same way, on the strength of their dreams these ungodly people pollute their own bodies, reject authority and heap abuse on celestial beings.
korean_text: 그러한데 꿈꾸는 이 사람들도 그와 같이 육체를 더럽히며 권위를 업신여기며 영광을 비방하는도다

sentences.original_text: on the strength of their dreams
these ungodly people pollute their own bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 이 경건하지 않은 사람들은 자기 몸을 더럽힙니다

sentences.original_text: and heap abuse on celestial beings
